Name: Global Infection
About the game: Save the world by fighting a global infection in all corners of the globe. A unique combination of game genres ((Action/Survival, Flight Simulation, Bombing, Shooting, Driving) combined into one game provide a thrilling and all-round experience like no other. Choose from 10 highly-detailed, varied levels all with their own twist. Escape hordes of zombies in the woods of America, land a plane in an emergency in Tokyo, drop bombs on hundreds of scurrying infected over Hawaii, avoid infected zombie ships that want to sink you or run over zombies on a stretch of road in Australia (with Kangaroos) and upon completion of all 10 exciting levels explore our solar system with in-depth information spoken about every planet you pass in a flyable space shuttle. 10 LEVELS: Survive - North America Battleship - Atlantic Ocean Rescue - South America Bomber - Hawaii Survive - England (Europe) Land - Tokyo (Asia) Choices - Indian Ocean Road Rage - Australia (Oceania) Supplies - Russia (Asia) Escort - Central Africa
